titlStmt.titl: EngMeta Metadata Block Configuration for Dataverse

citation.biblCit: Seeland, Anett, 2020, "EngMeta Metadata Block Configuration for Dataverse", https://doi.org/10.18419/darus-508, DaRUS, V1

titlStmt.titl: EngMeta Metadata Block Configuration for Dataverse

grantNo.agency: Federal Ministry of Education and Research (BMBF)

stdyInfo.abstract:
This dataset containts TSV-Files for the configuration of two metadata blocks for data repositories basing on Dataverse. The two blocks help to describe datasets with the concepts of the metadata scheme EngMeta. To add a metadata block to a Dataverse installation use the instructions in the Dataverse Admin Guide. EngMetaDataverse.tsv represents the engineering specific part of EngMeta containing the fields:
  • Type of Data Generation
  • Measured Variables
  • Controlled Variables
  • System Phases
  • System or Phase Components
  • System Parameters
  • Force Field
  • Force Field Parameters
  • Spatial Resolution
  • Temporal Resolution
  • Flows
  • Boundary Parameters
process.tsv represents the process describing part of EngMeta containing the fields:
  • Processing Methods
  • Method Parameters
  • Software
  • Instruments
  • Environments
  • Processing Steps
stdyInfo.relPubl: Selent, B., Kraus, H., Hansen, N., Schembera, B., Seeland, A. & Iglezakis, D. (forthcoming). Management of Research Data in Computational Fluid Dynamics and Thermodynamics. In: Proceedings der E-Science-Tage 2019.
stdyInfo.relStdy: Iglezakis, Dorothea; Schembera, Björn, 2019, "EngMeta - a Metadata Scheme for the Engineering Sciences", https://doi.org/10.18419/darus-500, DaRUS
